name: MEC Silk Travel Rectangular Liner - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Lighter and more compact than cotton or fleece, this silk liner protects your sleeping bag so it needs less frequent washing. Many trekkers also carry a liner to put a layer of luxury between themselves and sometimes sketchy hostel beds.Rectangular-shaped cut.No zipper, but closes nice and snug with three silk ties.Integrated pillow sleeve.Stuff sack attached at bottom hem.

        Sustainability
